title: nicemycoin
author: nicemycoin
content: Any Africa friends are interested in working for me freely everday,will be paid by day or hours,I am sure it will be much higher level salary than your current job doing for now.contact me by DM(better send your social media chatting accounts) ,I will talk with you for more details.No joke,no scam,its seriously.

comments.author: tokens-liquidity-provider
comments.created_time: October 10, 2022, 05:35:45 PMLast edit: October 13, 2022, 06:45:58 AM by tokens-liquidity-provider
comments.body: Helloi am interested in the job.Send mail to me - cryptotrending784@gmail.com

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You may get more replies if you mention the type of work you might want someone for and be a little more open about the pay. Your choice of course, just trying to help as only 1 person has posted any interest to this point.

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.created_time: October 10, 2022, 06:46:28 PMLast edit: October 16, 2022, 08:46:41 PM by igehhh
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 10, 2022, 05:57:20 PMYou may get more replies if you mention the type of work you might want someone for and be a little more open about the pay. Your choice of course, just trying to help as only 1 person has posted any interest to this point.I expected that from the OP as well; if you need someone, I believe it is best to post specifics about the type of job you are hiring for.OP You can contact me if its anything I can do or refer you to someone who can. Of course, that is my region.. @igebotzEdit: The OP does not appear to be a serious person; he has been moving around looking for PR managers for project promotions with no job details.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 10, 2022, 05:57:20 PMYou may get more replies if you mention the type of work you might want someone for and be a little more open about the pay. Your choice of course, just trying to help as only 1 person has posted any interest to this point.You just nailed it!!!! Africans are ever willing to work and you can get many from this forum. How would I apply for a job I might not have the skill to do. And sometimes I am scared of people that announce that their project is not a scam. What are the job specifications and qualifications?

What are the job specifications and qualifications?The post says, he needs a worker from Africa, not necessarily African. Read and understand.

comments.author: mela65
comments.body: I don't think there is anyone working in African mines on this forum. Anyone who has reached this forum is probably earning above the African average anyway. I hope you will find what you want and give them what they deserve not a bit higher than the exploited workers.

comments.author: Zwei
comments.created_time: October 14, 2022, 05:28:51 AMLast edit: October 14, 2022, 05:52:08 AM by Zwei
comments.body: Lol, anyone who is serious would have disclosed the pay and the type of work to not waste people's time!Generally, people who want you to "work" for them and do not state what the job is publicly, it's always something shady or illegal.
